heatmap.noShortcuts: No shortcuts found for this key

footer.description: Professional developer keyboard shortcut navigation platform

meta.title: KeyFlow - Developer Shortcut Navigation Platform
meta.description: KeyFlow is a professional shortcut navigation platform that provides comprehensive shortcuts for mainstream IDEs and editors such as VSCode, IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm, and PyCharm. With interactive heatmap and global search features, it enhances developer productivity.
meta.keywords: shortcuts, developer tools, VSCode shortcuts, IntelliJ IDEA shortcuts, WebStorm shortcuts, PyCharm shortcuts, programmer tools, IDE shortcuts, editor shortcuts, development efficiency

toolGrid.name: Name
toolGrid.clickHeartToFavorite: Click the heart icon on tool cards to favorite tools
toolGrid.noCategoryTools: No tools available in this category

toolDetail.heatmapDescription: Click keyboard keys to view corresponding shortcuts. Color intensity represents usage frequency

shortcutList.adjustFilters: Try adjusting search criteria or filter options

searchResults.tryDifferentKeywords: Try using different keywords or check spelling

toolDescriptions.vscode: A lightweight code editor developed by Microsoft, supporting multiple programming languages and a rich plugin ecosystem.
toolDescriptions.sublime: A high-performance text editor known for its fast response and powerful multi-cursor editing features.
toolDescriptions.intellij-java: A Java IDE developed by JetBrains, providing powerful code analysis, refactoring, and debugging features. It's the preferred tool for Java development.
toolDescriptions.eclipse: An open-source integrated development environment, primarily used for Java development, supporting multiple programming languages.
toolDescriptions.android-studio: Google's official Android app development IDE, built on IntelliJ IDEA.
toolDescriptions.xcode: Apple's official iOS and macOS app development IDE, runs only on macOS.
toolDescriptions.hbuilderx: A professional front-end IDE developed by DCloud, optimized for uni-app and 5+App development.
toolDescriptions.webstorm: A professional Web front-end IDE developed by JetBrains, providing strong support for JavaScript and related technologies.
toolDescriptions.goland: A Go language IDE developed by JetBrains, providing intelligent code assistance, debugging, and testing tools for Go development.
toolDescriptions.pycharm: A Python IDE developed by JetBrains, providing intelligent code completion, checking, debugging, and refactoring features.
toolDescriptions.clion: A C/C++ development environment developed by JetBrains, providing intelligent code assistance and powerful debugging features.
toolDescriptions.atom: An open-source text editor developed by GitHub, highly customizable. Although no longer updated, it still has a large user base.
toolDescriptions.photoshop: Adobe's professional image editing software, the industry standard for digital image processing.
toolDescriptions.figma: A modern collaborative UI design tool that supports real-time collaboration and prototyping.
toolDescriptions.chrome-devtools: Developer tools built into Google Chrome browser for web debugging and performance analysis.
toolDescriptions.firefox-devtools: Developer tools built into Mozilla Firefox browser, providing powerful web debugging and analysis features.

shortcutDescriptions.show_in_new_window: Show Active File in New Window/Instance
